name: Nqobizitha Mlambo
bio: Nqobizitha Mlambo is a development expert with a BSc from the University of Zimbabwe and an MSc from the University of Manchester. He has worked in civil society across Southern Africa (2018-2022), including as Programme Officer for Advocacy at ZIMCODD and leading the SAPSN Youth Network. As Director of Catalyst Centre, he specialises in leadership, donor engagement, and programme implementation.
